verbs.description: players from almost all of the nfl teams [V: are] using the vicis zero1 helmet the zero1 helmet from seattle start - up vicis has been rated as best at reducing head impacts two years in a row by the nfl now players from almost every team are wearing the zero1 and the company has a contract with the military to improve combat helmets helmet football army national football league nfl doug baldwin golden tate lamar miller vicis russell wilson virginia tech
